creditline: Gift of Michele Beiny in memory of her grandfather Hanns Weinberg
description: cup and saucer, ceramic-porcelain, French, XVIIIc (82.109.13.1 and .2) cat. card dims H of cup 2' diam of saucer 4-1/4; small cup with scroll handle and saucer with elaborate borders of rose magenta concentric circles around which are gilt foliate garlands forming half circles enclosing blue striated lines; in between borders are diamond-shaped reserves enclosing red rosettes; base of cup and center of saucer are decorated with green laurel garlands
title: Coffee cup
